Package io.micronaut.multitenancy.gorm

GORM Multitenancy - Micronaut Multitenancy Bridge.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    CookieTenantResolver
    A tenant resolver that resolves the tenant from the request HTTP Header.
    FixedTenantResolver
    A tenant resolver that resolves the tenant from the request HTTP Header.
    HttpHeaderTenantResolver
    A tenant resolver that resolves the tenant from the request HTTP Header.
    PrincipalTenantResolver
    A tenant resolver that resolves the tenant from the authenticated principal.
    SessionTenantResolver
    Resolves the tenant id from the user HTTP session.
    SubdomainTenantResolver
    A tenant resolver that resolves the tenant from the Subdomain.
    SystemPropertyTenantResolver
    A tenant resolver that resolves the tenant from the request HTTP Header.
    TenantResolverAdapter
    An adapter between GORM TenantResolver and Micronaut TenantResolver.

Package io.micronaut.multitenancy.gorm Description

GORM Multitenancy - Micronaut Multitenancy Bridge.
Since:
1.0
Author:
Sergio del Amo
